vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.
